meanings.definition: To make a low, guttural sound in the throat, as a dog.
meanings.sent1: The dog was growling at the stranger approaching the house.
meanings.sent2: The bear was growling loudly in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat started growling playfully at the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The thunder growling in the distance signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The engine of the old car was growling as it struggled up the hill.

meanings.definition: A low, guttural sound made in the throat, as a dog.
meanings.sent1: The growling of the dog scared the mailman away.
meanings.sent2: The deep growling of the lion echoed through the savanna.
meanings.sent3: The growling from the stomach indicated it was time for lunch.
meanings.sent4: The growling of the thunderstorm kept everyone indoors.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious growling in the dark alley made her walk faster.
